member.name: M:InquiryService.Controllers.InquiryController.GetInquiries
member.remarks: This API method returns a list of all available inquiries.

member.name: M:InquiryService.Controllers.InquiryController.GetInquiry(System.Int32)
member.remarks: This API method returns details of an inquiry based on its ID.

member.name: M:InquiryService.Controllers.InquiryController.CreateInquiry(InquiryService.Models.Inquiry)
member.remarks: This API method allows creating a new inquiry.
member.param: The information of the new inquiry to be created.

member.name: T:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry
member.summary: Represents an inquiry related to a property listing.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID of the inquiry.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of the inquiry.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.PropertyID
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the associated property.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the email address of the person making the inquiry.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the person making the inquiry.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Inquiry.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the message or question associated with the inquiry.
member.example: I'm interested in this property. Can you provide more details?

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID of the property.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property.
member.example: Moradia a venda em Figueiró dos Vinhos

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the property (e.g., residential, commercial).

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the property.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the price of the property.

member.name: P:InquiryService.Models.Property.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the property.
member.example: Venha conhecer a moradia dos seus sonhos!
